column1: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Movement Points, Simulation

This sprawling empire game is set in the  Star Fleet Universe. Players command one or more races in a variety of scenarios as they replay the "historical" situations in the galactic politics of the future.<br/><br/>It is the base set for the Federation and Empire series of products.<br/><br/>The Star Fleet Universe series is based on the game Star Fleet Battles, and Federation & Empire is a strategic game based in that background.
